mapper.select: SELECT c.productId , c.userId , c.cnt , p.img , p.price , p.discount , p.productName FROM shopping.cart c INNER JOIN shopping.products p ON c.productId = p.productId WHERE c.userId = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE userId=#{userId} AND productId=#{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.productId , c.userId , c.cnt , p.img , p.price , p.discount , p.productName FROM shopping.tmpCart c INNER JOIN shopping.products p ON c.productId = p.productId WHERE c.userId = #{userId}
